item.title: CVE-2024-29770|2024-06-04T17:58:07.059Z -- pretty%20links -- shortlinks%20by%20pretty%20links
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pretty Links Shortlinks by Pretty Links allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Shortlinks by Pretty Links: from n/a through 3.6.2.
